channel.title: Infiltration Online
channel.description: Discussion of anything related to playing Infiltration online, from setting up a server, to requests for server game styles, to online strategies.

item.title: Are there currently any servers or active players?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ghost_Kage)
item.dc:creator: Ghost_Kage
item.content:encoded:
Hello! I am actually, believe it or not, NEW to Infiltration! Despite it's age I read about it and had to give it a try. However, I see that also due to it's age I can't seem to find anyone playing it. Do I have to download the code mentioned in a previous post to see servers or are there just not any? I would really like to play this with others so if anyone still plays please let me know!

Thanks,

Ghost Kage

item.title: Current server list
item.author: invalid@example.com (Crowze)
item.dc:creator: Crowze
item.content:encoded:
While the master server is down, and until I can get hold of DaddyBone, here's a list of all the currently-running servers we know of:

Code:
[INF_Browser.INF_BrowserFavoritesFact]
FavoriteCount=4
Favorites[0]=INF Coop #1 (Unreal + RTNP) w/ PsyTex-1.0 [inf.cerberon.net]\213.239.200.83\17778\False
Favorites[1]=INF Coop #2 (custom maps, fast d/l) w/ PsyTex-1.0 [inf.cerberon.net]\213.239.200.83\27778\False
Favorites[2]=-= XploD =-  PsyTex DTAS Server\85.214.68.31\7778\False...
Current server list

item.title: INF Coop server with Unreal (I) maps?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Stinkmarder)
item.dc:creator: Stinkmarder
item.content:encoded:
Would you play on an Infiltration Coop Server running all maps from "Unreal" and "Unreal Mission Pack: Return to Na Pali"?
(Means: Players (all in one team) with INF weaponry fighting monsters on the way through the Unreal world)

I consider setting up such a server if at least some people are interested in it. So please vote!

--
There are some issues which need to be addressed in order to make all maps playable, e.g. in "DasaPass" you have...

INF Coop server with Unreal (I) maps?

item.title: Does anybody ever play anymore?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hitman 4 Hire)
item.dc:creator: Hitman 4 Hire
item.content:encoded: where is everybody on inf? it's become a absolute ghost town with a few ghosts wandering around.

item.title: Play COOP or INF TDM\Assault tonight? [Nov 03, 2012]
item.author: invalid@example.com (DarkStar911)
item.dc:creator: DarkStar911
item.content:encoded:
I saw some people on earlier tonight, just wondering if anyone wanted to hop on. I am stuck on the COOP map Temple to Vandora or something. It is a part of the Jone's pack. But anyways, either one... Coop or TDM\Assault. I will be around... if you want an exact time... 8:00PM Eastern Time Zone USA.

Hope some people come join...

item.title: Playing INF COOP COME JOIN :D
item.author: invalid@example.com (DarkStar911)
item.dc:creator: DarkStar911
item.content:encoded: Join me, I'm stuck on a coop map... today is the 30th of Octorber, 2012.

item.title: Packs for gaming
item.author: invalid@example.com (MadWoffen)
item.dc:creator: MadWoffen
item.content:encoded:
Hey there. So there are still some survivors here ?

Can someone put a guide/link/swiss-knife-sticky-thread allowing to someone who wishes to re-install from scratch to do it properly ? I had an attempt some years ago but was unable to enter due to the massive add-ons I had to dl every time. Thank you.

item.title: I have a new Unreal server
item.author: invalid@example.com (oZ INF DM)
item.dc:creator: oZ INF DM
item.content:encoded:
Anyone ever play the oldunreal Infiltration DM? Got a 20 player for it, Redrum Deathmatches now, "peep game" lol


Does the CACHE for infiltration 2.9 use the same cache as UT's? I've set my purgecachedays=0



AND

If I install the old Infiltration 2.75 for UT , will it overwrite the 2.9?

item.title: Any scheduled times to play?
item.author: invalid@example.com (InfernalRage)
item.dc:creator: InfernalRage
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone,
I recently reinstalled Infiltration after several years and was just wondering if there was a small community that still plays. Are there any ever scheduled events, and if so when are they? If there are none, does anyone want to play anytime this week?
My name on the game was InfernalRage as well, if anyone recognizes me.

Also, I would like to say Infiltration is the...

Any scheduled times to play?

item.title: Noob questions for setting up a server
item.author: invalid@example.com (ant75)
item.dc:creator: ant75
item.content:encoded:
I'm in the process of setting up a server from my home, but there are still several problems i haven't figured out. I'll start with the more noobish ones, surely more are to come later .

-Whenever i launch a server, whether from a bat file or within Inf, the map list doesn't seem to work. Players can see the available maplist, but the server keeps replaying the same map over and over, even if players vote for another map. I've tried restarting the server with the correct template using...

Noob questions for setting up a server

item.title: Infiltration UT Style
item.author: invalid@example.com (oZ INF DM)
item.dc:creator: oZ INF DM
item.content:encoded: I was wondering if the Infiltration 2.75,not 2.9 for UT works well enough to run on a server ? Like, if I ran this, would they have to have the mod installed already, or could they download it and connect no problem? And would it be listed in the pop UT servers?????????????????????????????

Hi!

Welcome & Have fun in new Eas Server 84.255.245.128 : 7777
Welcome also on Ventrilo Server for ventrilo client 2.3.0 ip = 84.255.245.128 port 3784
Ventrilo server have some inf channels.If u need a private channel mail me or pm me here.

Os = Linux Fedora
server netspeed=20000 maxservertickrate 33
I hope u will test it

I got place on my webpage for fast redirection.
